title: Vanilla Cake || Eggless || New Year Special ğŸ‚
content:
Cake Recipe: Basic Vanilla Cake with FrostingÂ  Servings : 6 piecesÂ  Hi I wish everyone Happy New Year 2018 ğŸŠğŸ‚ğŸ˜Šâ˜ƒï¸â„ï¸ I was a bit late wishing you all because I'm busy with other stuff and now ready to share my cake recipe on special day ğŸ™‚ On this new year day everyone celebrates by cutting cake, going trips, shopping, treats, thrill rides or any adventures or exploring new places to make their day special and memorable. I think all of you are busy in any one of them okay let's go to the basic cake recipe it is vanilla cake. I know it's basic one almost everyone of you made it long ago might be not surprising. So I prepared basic vanilla cake layered and frosting to make it colorful. Isn't it appetizing ? I don't like to cut it ğŸ™ƒ Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:Â 
  • All purpose flour - 100 gms
  • Butter - 100 gms
  • Powdered sugar - 100 gms
  • Condensed Milk - 1/4 cup
  • Oil - 1/4 cup
  • Milk - 3 tb sp
  • Vanilla essence - 1 tsp
  • Baking powder - 1 tsp
  • Baking soda - 1/2 tsp
Procedure:
  • Sieve all purpose flour and Keep aside
  • In a large mixing bowl add butter, powdered sugarÂ Mix well till incorporated with hand mixer or whisk it
  • Next add vanilla essence, condensed milk, oil and milk
  • Mix well
  • Next add mixed dry flour along with baking soda and baking powder
  • Mix well till incorporated and cake batter should be pouring consistency
  • Add batter in a cake mould with wax paper
  • Preheat oven at 320 F/ 160 C and bake upto 40 mins
  • Let it rest 5 mins and check by inserting Â toothpick/ knife at the center of cake
  • If toothpick comes out clean then it cooked well
Frosting: First make butter cream frosting and divide it into two piping bags with star tip ( two different sizes of star tip ) Buttercream frosting:Â 
  • I shared how to make buttercream frosting Â inÂ Eggless Cocoa Cake ğŸ‡ || Special || Kids
  • Take 1/4th quantity of butter cream frosting in piping bag
  • Keep it aside
Chocolate Frosting:
  • Rest of the butter cream frosting add 2 tsp's of cocoa powder and mix well
  • Now add in other piping bag
  • Keep it aside
Assembling cake:
  • Divide the cake by using knife
  • Take base layer and add butter cream frosting
  • Spread equally
  • Stack with other layer and apply thin layer of chocolate frosting
  • Keep it in refrigerator upto 15 mins so that it won't be messy / sticky while piping stars on it
  • First put 4 stars side by side in 3 lines next give 1/2 inch space and again put stars with chocolate frosting . Repeat the process for 6 times as shown in picture
  • Fill the gap with butter cream frosting
  • Fill the cake with stars as shown in picture
  • Refrigerate 10 mins to set properly
  • Serve it in parties / occasions / special days like new year ğŸ™‚
  • Again, I wish you all a very Happy New Year 2018 ğŸ‚ and successful day ahead
You can checkout myÂ Eggless Cocoa Cake ğŸ‡ || Special || KidsÂ Â for pictures Note:
  • I prepared a very small cake you can increase the quantity to make big one
  • Some of you like to make cake with egg, so add 2 eggs and avoid condensed milk & oil
  • I was busy and didn't took pictures of making cake, will post clearly with pictures in another post
